verification.subject: Your verification code - M-Clearance
verification.html:
M-Clearance

Email Verification

Verify Your Email Address

Hello {name},

Thank you for registering with M-Clearance. To complete your registration, please use the verification code below:

{code}

This code will expire in 10 minutes for security reasons.

If you didn't request this verification, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
M-Clearance Team
support@mclearanceisam.com
verification.text:
Hello {name},

Your verification code is: {code}

This code will expire in 10 minutes.

If you didn't request this verification, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
M-Clearance Team
support@mclearanceisam.com

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request - M-Clearance
passwordReset.html:
M-Clearance

Password Reset

Reset Your Password

Hello {name},

You have requested to reset your password. Click the button below to reset your password:

Reset Password

This link will expire in 1 hour for security reasons.

If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
M-Clearance Team
support@mclearanceisam.com
passwordReset.text:
Hello {name},

You have requested to reset your password. Click the link below to reset your password:

{resetLink}

This link will expire in 1 hour for security reasons.

If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email.

Best regards,
M-Clearance Team
support@mclearanceisam.com

approval.subject: Application Approved - M-Clearance
approval.html:
ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations!

Application Approved

Your Application Has Been Approved

Hello {name},

Congratulations! Your clearance application has been approved. You can now access all features of the M-Clearance system.

Next Steps:

  • Log in to your account
  • Complete your profile information
  • Start using the clearance services

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Best regards,
M-Clearance Team
support@mclearanceisam.com

rejection.subject: Application Status Update - M-Clearance
rejection.html:
M-Clearance

Application Status Update

Application Status Update

Hello {name},

We regret to inform you that your application requires additional information or documentation before it can be processed.

Next Steps:

  • Review the feedback provided
  • Submit additional required documents
  • Contact support for clarification

Please log in to your account to view detailed feedback and submit any additional information required.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Best regards,
M-Clearance Team
support@mclearanceisam.com
